description: Kent North and Carlos Morales, two of the biggest, greediest powerbottoms in the business, go deep for the Hardcore Director's Cut Bonus Scene, screwing each other with some of the biggest toys in our production kits. Disc Two also contains our trademark cumshot and fuck compilations, XXX gallery, and a fascinating 15-minute look Behind The Scenes during the making of Justice. Grab your copy of Justice today - what would you do to get it?
title: Justice, Scene #07
